title: Soldier, one of a pair
description: standing man with mustache, large bulging eyes, red lips, and painted facial hair; dressed in decorated and painted armor and helmet; upper arm sleeves are comprised of a wild cat in which the mans arm appears to emerge from the animals open mouth; PR hand is resting on hip; PR arm is raised, yet broken at the upper forearm and missing
creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
